title: [Large-Scale] Workshop on Utilizing Automated Instructional Design Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic instructional design theories and experience in language education
context.additional_context: Focused on strengthening competencies in developing language education content using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can create language education design documents within three stages using basic features of automated instructional design tools
Learners can apply at least three instructional strategies using databases and templates provided by the tool
Learners can resolve over 80% of knowledge gaps encountered during the design process through tool-integrated reference materials
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
